programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Catch a Wave in Capitola, CA
programme.desc: Take your first surf lesson on Capitola’s perfect beginner waves. Satisfy your appetite at a local deli named after a beloved pet. Then, get some ‘pretty good advice’ and journey into the forest looking for clues at The Mystery Spot.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Out and About in Bloomfield
programme.desc: Ed and Day head to Bloomfield for a rousing game of dek hockey, an education in cheese, and an intro to glass art. The guys finish their day at a “slappers and bangers” party.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown & Beyond: Planes, Ducks & Subs
programme.desc: A car or the T might be the typical way to travel, but Rob’s on a mission to explore some of the more unique modes of transport the Boston area’s got to offer.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Missing in Milwaukee
programme.desc: A missing Milwaukee woman's family and her community push for answers about her disappearance. What authorities learn a week later sends shockwaves through the city.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Evil Unearthed on a Sleepy Farm
programme.desc: When bones are discovered burned in a rural New Hampshire community, a horrific story begins to emerge…one that exposes the secrets of a charming killer living among them.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Riveting Recoveries of Stolen Items
programme.desc: From paying ransoms to scouring hand-drawn treasure maps, these theft victims will do anything to recover their precious property.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Meet a Selfless Woman Taking In Amazing Special Needs Children
programme.desc: Justin, Ryan and Tony introduce us to a real-life superhero who has opened her home and heart to special needs children.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Catch of the Day
programme.desc: Chefs Nate Schoedel and Ivan Gil-Silva are casting their nets for the best Catch of the Day dishes in today's seafood showdown. Can our chefs reel in a victory? Or will they let the big one get away?

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Johnny Damon, Foodie Fashionisto, & Wedding Photog Dole Out Hot Havens
programme.desc: Tourists might love Orlando, but nobody loves it quite like our local experts. They’’ll show you where to satisfy your hunger with Biggie’s Bomb-Mi sandwich, watch someone else feed a gator, and eat from the garden of Eden.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Catch the Spirit of Adventure, From Mars to Marathons
programme.desc: They take to the skies and seas, hit the open road, or attempt to reunite with a loved one. This episode of Stitch inspires the adventurous spirit through those who have bravely charted their own paths.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Smoking Gun in a Rebellious Teen’s Devastating Disappearance
programme.desc: The disappearance of 16-year-old JaRay Wilson spawns rumors of human trafficking in her small town in 2012. Investigators find her body and the truth, after an unlikely informant provides new details.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque: Packing a Punch with a MMA champ
programme.desc: MMA champion Michelle Waterson-Gomez takes Amanda on a high-energy day in Albuquerque. From throwing punches inside the octagon to dancing up high on aerial silks, this dynamic duo never seems to break a sweat.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Go Fast or Take It Slow in Biloxi, MS
programme.desc: Live like a legend in this vibrant coastal city. Devour a Burger Burger Burger Burger, race high speed go-karts, climb to the top of a historic lighthouse and experience a level of fine dining that will make you want to “slap your mama!”

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race By Runner’s World, Vol 3
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate, presents stories from around the country of runners using their sport for good.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: NYC Ramen Master Takes On “Famous” Seafood Fanatic in Culinary Color Challenge
programme.desc: Veteran NYC Chef Ten Vong squares up against Jimmy's Famous Seafood rep Charlie Wickboldt. Watch these chefs transform their colorful careers into even more colorful plates. Who will find the tomato trophy at the end of the rainbow?

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Remix Dishes to Savor from the Midwest
programme.desc: Discover where classic dishes collide to create delightful flavors. From pizza debates to the Juicy Lucy to a good old-fashioned red beer, see how regional creativity transforms beloved foods into something more.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.sub-title: In Transit: Skylar Astin
programme.desc: Esquire’s Dave Holmes chats with Pitch Perfect’s Skylar Astin about New Orleans.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: Odd Jobs
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to ask people about the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Odd Jobs," contestants learn about a kid-run food truck, a school board member with a special license and a senior citizen that's into heavy work.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Show Me Milwaukee: Olympic Gymnastics, Speed Skating Races, and Sailing Lake Michigan
programme.desc: Greg hangs out with world champion gymnast, Chellsie Memmel, as they explore the Olympic history of Milwaukee. They meet up with other Olympians, including Gold medalist Bonnie Blair, for an exciting day of gymnastics, speed skating, and more!

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in The 'Burgh: Rowing Hard in Millvale
programme.desc: Ed and Day make gnocci and join in on a Hearts of Steel rowing team practice along the Allegheny River before ending the day at Grist House Craft Brewery in Millvale.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: All in the Family
programme.desc: Patrick Shea, Chef and Owner of CK Pearl and Decklyns in Essex and Gloucester and Chef Kladji Plaku, Chef de Cuisine at City Table, City Barn & Solas in Boston engage in a battle of culinary skill. Will a surprise guest judge change everything?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Sacramento: Going Gourmet
programme.desc: Pop the champagne: we’re getting fancy! Will Chef Polo Adamo incorporate the caviar more creatively than Chef Dennis Sydnor? It's anybody's gourmet guess.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Baseball Legend Ryan Ripken Pitches Angel a Day of Iconic Institutions
programme.desc: Angel joins baseball legend, Ryan Ripken, for a home run day, exploring the best of Baltimore. They bat 100 at Ripken Stadium, learn about sea life at the National Aquarium, crush indoor rock climbing and show down in an epic cook-off.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Iowa Athletes Embody Midwestern Grit
programme.desc: Whether it's a wrestling star training through grief, champion rollerskaters challenged on the world stage, or a cycling team pushing through obstacles, Iowans don't back down when the going gets tough.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Don’t Cave Into The Pressure
programme.desc: Ivan Gomez is on a weight loss journey, but it’s one that’s been limited to exercising in his home. Kinga meets Ivan in Stockton, CA to show him how the outdoors can be a personal gym for body, mind and spirit.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: America's Goofiest Getaways
programme.desc: From stealing an ambulance after leaving a hospital to hijacking a helicopter for the sake of love, these criminals have odd motives and even odder methods of executing them.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Soul Foodie, Bathroom Beauty, & Bakehouse Boss Share Top Hot Spots
programme.desc: In Orlando, our local experts tell you where to devour hummingbird cake, quench your thirst with an intoxicating fish bowl, and find the best bathrooms. These ‘City Beautiful’ experts know which spots are worth your time.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.sub-title: West by Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Widowed At 19
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Two high school sweethearts had their love story cut too short.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Mystery of Maura Murray
programme.desc: Known as one of the first cases of the digital age, Maura Murray's mysterious disappearance continues to confound investigators and internet sleuths.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.
